entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 3:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain changing to rain this evening. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
